description: Comprehensive peripheral device information collection focusing on external monitors, printers, input devices, and USB devices for inventory purposes

external_monitors_device_desc.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\', ''), '\DeviceDesc', '') as pnp_device_id, data as friendly_name, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND data != '';
external_monitors_device_desc.description: External monitor device descriptions with parsed PnP IDs

external_monitors_hardware_ids.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\', ''), '\HardwareID', '') as pnp_device_id, data as hardware_id, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%\%\HardwareID' AND data != '';
external_monitors_hardware_ids.description: External monitor hardware IDs with parsed PnP IDs

external_monitors_class.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\', ''), '\Class', '') as pnp_device_id, data as class, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%\%\Class' AND data != '';
external_monitors_class.description: External monitor device class information with parsed PnP IDs

external_monitors_service.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\', ''), '\Service', '') as pnp_device_id, data as service, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\DISPLAY\%\%\Service' AND data != '';
external_monitors_service.description: External monitor service information with parsed PnP IDs

printers_registry.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\', '') as printer_name, 'PrinterName' as name, data as data, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%' AND name = 'Name' AND data NOT LIKE '%Microsoft Print to PDF%' AND data NOT LIKE '%Microsoft XPS Document Writer%' AND data NOT LIKE '%Fax%' AND data != '';
printers_registry.description: Real printer names from registry (excluding virtual printers)

printers_drivers.query: SELECT REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\', '') as printer_name, 'DriverName' as name, data as driver_name, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Print\Printers\%' AND name = 'Printer Driver' AND data != '';

usb_device_registry.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USB\', ''), '\DeviceDesc', '') as usb_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USB\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND data != '';
usb_device_registry.description: USB device descriptions with parsed device IDs

usb_device_hardware_ids.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USB\', ''), '\HardwareID', '') as usb_device_id, data as hardware_id, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USB\%\%\HardwareID' AND data != '';
usb_device_hardware_ids.description: USB device hardware IDs with parsed device IDs

input_devices_keyboards.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\', ''), '\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND LOWER(data) LIKE '%keyboard%' AND data != '';
input_devices_keyboards.description: Connected keyboard devices from HID enumeration

input_devices_mice.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(path, 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\', ''), '\DeviceDesc', '') as hid_device_id, data as device_description, path as registry_path FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\HID\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND LOWER(data) LIKE '%mouse%' AND data != '';
input_devices_mice.description: Connected mouse and pointing devices from HID enumeration

audio_devices.query: SELECT path, name, data as device_info FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\MMDevices\Audio\%' AND data != '';

bluetooth_devices.query: SELECT path, name, data as device_info FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\BTHPORT\Parameters\Devices\%' AND data != '';

camera_devices.query: SELECT path, name, data as device_info FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\DeviceClasses\{65e8773d-8f56-11d0-a3b9-00a0c9223196}\%' AND data != '';

storage_devices.query: SELECT path, name, data as device_info FROM registry WHERE path LIKE 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Enum\USBSTOR\%\%\DeviceDesc' AND data != '';
storage_devices.description: USB storage devices from registry enumeration
